channel.title: Young Man Game on
channel.description: Recent content in Young Man Game on

item.title: Blow Your Mind
item.description: Wanna hear some deep questions and our takes on them. Listen to this episode and see how and who we are.

item.title: Privacy
item.description: Sometimes one of us sees something in the world we gotta talk about. Let’s talk a little about privacy and how we are compromised.

item.title: Judgement
item.description: Nobody likes being judged. It can be one of the worst things throughout your day to feel judged. Let’s talk about how this has affected lives. Don’t worry we won’t give you the same you’re special and you only need you speech. You will get an honest opinion on how we live our life and how we handle being judged by others and how we judge ourselves.

item.title: Breakups
item.description: Stress can take away from the most of your life. It can affect your sleep schedule as well as your relationships with others.

item.title: Catch Up
item.description: I’ve been gone for a bit and wanna get back into the groove of things. Let’s talk about it here on my latest podcast episode.

item.title: Dating Arena
item.description: Check out our latest podcast about dating!

item.title: Time Management
item.description: I have some new years resolutions but are they really because of the new year or are they being stated during the new year… find out by listening

item.title: New Year Resolutions
item.description: This week we talk about time management. We are all given the same amount of time in the day to do with what we please but we all need to learn how to manage that time better to make the most out of our day and more importantly our life.

item.title: Your Self Image
item.description: Self image is something people take for granted and don’t try to build it. Let’s talk about ways we can build it and what you can do to make sure you stand out in a crowd.

item.title: Fixing Bad Communication
item.description: Here are a few things you can do to help yourself be a better communicator and honestly it’s just ranting about how people now today have no RESPEKT….

item.title: Travel Through Communication
item.description: Communication. The way we as people communicate has changed a lot through out the ages. Before we talk about the pitfalls of todays communication mediums and habits lets talk about how communication has advanced throughout time.

item.title: Attention
item.description: The world is filled with people glued to something other than the here and now. Listen to Trevor Curtis and Kym_B talk about this and ways to combat it.
